Uses of Interface
javax.microedition.sensor.DataListener

Packages that use DataListener
javax.microedition.sensor This package provides the classes and interfaces of the Mobile Sensor API mandatory part. 
 

Uses of DataListener in javax.microedition.sensor
 

Subinterfaces of DataListener in javax.microedition.sensor
 interface DataAndErrorListener
          The DataAndErrorListener interface is implemented by the application to receive data and errors from the sensor.
 

Methods in javax.microedition.sensor with parameters of type DataListener
